help.name: help
help.label: Help Center
help.title: Resume Generator Tutorial
help.description: Learn how to use Essmote AI resume generator - from filling information to exporting your resume.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.description: Click the button in the top right corner
getting_started.after_image: to enter the resume editor page.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.description: Fill in your basic information such as name, city, email, phone, etc.
tips: Optional fields like LinkedIn and GitHub can be filled if available, or left empty
Photo is optional and doesn't affect resume generation

education.title: Education
education.description: Fill in your school, major, dates, and grades. For multiple degrees, click the button above:
education.after_image: to add new school records. Courses can be filled in Chinese or English.

work_experience.title: Work / Internship Experience
work_experience.description: Fill in your work or internship experiences. For each experience, clearly describe:
work_experience.after_tips: If you can't write in English, enter in Chinese and click the
work_experience.after_image: button to auto-convert to English. **AI generation is unlimited** - keep generating until you're satisfied. Choose the best version and fine-tune manually. For multiple jobs, click:

research_projects.title: Research / Projects
research_projects.description: Fill in research, coursework, or project experiences if any. You can include:
research_projects.after_image: to convert to professional English. Skip if you have no research experience. **AI generation can be used multiple times** until satisfied.

activities.title: Activities
activities.after_image: to add more. Activity content supports Chinese input, click:
activities.after_image2: to auto-generate English descriptions. **Generate multiple times to choose the best version**.

module_selection.title: Module Selection
module_selection.description: The left panel shows your resume structure modules. You can:
tips: ✅ Check: content you want to display in resume
extra_tips: Don't want to show research → just uncheck it
Job seeking only → check 'Work Experience + Skills'
module_selection.after_image: System automatically generates resume structure based on your selections.

preview_edit.title: Preview & Edit
preview_edit.description: On this page you can still modify education, work/internship, projects/research, and activities.
preview_edit.warning: This page doesn't support AI regeneration. To have AI rewrite content, return to the input page and click 'AI Generate'.

template_selection.title: Template Selection
template_selection.description: Select different resume templates on the right side.
tips: Each template only affects: layout style, font style, and module positions

layout_management.title: Layout Management
layout_management.after_tips: Drag modules to freely adjust display order in resume, for example:
layout_management.after_image:
✅ Left-Right Layout

Set which content displays in:

theme_color.title: Theme Color
theme_color.description: Freely choose your resume's main color. Click to preview, keep what you like.

export.title: Export Resume
export.description: Export to PDF or Word format from the top right corner.
export.tip: If you still want to edit content — Word format is recommended

quick_tips.title: Quick Tips
items: AI generation is unlimited - use repeatedly until satisfied
Chinese input + AI generate = Professional English descriptions
Modules can be freely selected, ordered, and laid out
Multiple templates and theme colors available
